description: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENTThe Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below. tags: Pressure, Temperature and Humidity Measuring and Controlling Instruments
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**



# Overview

The Department of National Defence invites bidders for the procurement of [Thermometers](terms: temperature-measuring device) to be delivered to [Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Halifax, Nova Scotia](address: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario) and [CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia](address: 101, promenade Colonel By, Ottawa, Ontario). 



## Procurement Details

- **Procurement Reference: #PW-22-01006248**
  - **Procurement Title:** Acquisition of Indicating Capillary Tube and Bulb Thermometers
  - **Procurement Number:** W8482-230691/B

- **Procurement Categories:** Goods and Services Domain (GD), Competitive
- **Procurement Method:** Open bidding
- **Procurement Language:**

  - English [link to document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/08/6bd5b3fc44d56d620bf4374e8fd25580/w8482-230691_b_english_rfp_clauses.pdf)
  - French [link to document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/08/5b0072ee81b6d8f05becd28d87c74058/w8482-230691_b_french_rfp_clauses.pdf)

- **Scope of Work:** Procurement of 24 (two types) thermometers:
  - Temperature Measuring Device : 14 Units
  - Temperature Measuring Device : 10 Units

- **Submission Requirements:**
  - Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars.
  - Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected.



## Contact Information
If you have any questions regarding the tender, please contact:
___Matthew Lengacher___ 
___ [_matthew.lengacher@forces.gc.ca_](mailto:matthew.lengacher@forces.gc.ca)___ 
017-939-3725



## Important Dates
- **Tender Closing Date:** 2022-10-11T14:00:00
- **Tender Status: Expired**

[Note: The tender has expired.]æk August. The country of delivery is Canada, specifically British Columbia ( Colombie-Britannique ) and Nova Scotia.
